mapper.insert: insert into order_receipt (orno, omid, osummary, odate, ofulladdr, odetailaddr, otel, orequirement, ototalprice, ostatus) values (#{orno}, #{omid}, #{osummary}, NOW(), #{ofulladdr}, #{odetailaddr}, #{otel}, #{orequirement}, #{ototalprice}, 0)
mapper.select: select ono from order_receipt where omid = #{omid} order by odate desc limit 1
select * from order_receipt where orno = #{orno} and ostatus = 0 order by odate desc
select * from order_receipt where orno = #{orno} and ostatus = 1 order by odate desc
mapper.update: update order_receipt set ostatus = 1 where ono = #{ono}
